explains: adj. 勤奋的，勤勉的；细致的，潜心的
wordGroup: diligent in 勤勉于…，勤奋好学

sentences.en: Meyers is a diligent and prolific worker.
sentences.cn: 迈耶斯是个勤奋而且出活多的工人。

sentences.en: For the future, try to be more diligent in your work.
He is both wise and diligent, so he makes good in everything.
sentences.cn: 他既聪明又勤勉，所以每件事都做很出色。
